<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="FIFA_World_Cup_·_Golden_Ball" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background:gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:FIFA_World_Cup_Golden_Ball" title="Template:FIFA World Cup Golden Ball"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background:gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:FIFA_World_Cup_Golden_Ball" title="Template talk:FIFA World Cup Golden Ball"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background:gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:FIFA_World_Cup_Golden_Ball&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background:gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="FIFA_World_Cup_·_Golden_Ball" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/FIFA_World_Cup" title="FIFA World Cup">FIFA World Cup</a> &#183; <a href="/wiki/FIFA_World_Cup_awards" title="FIFA World Cup awards">Golden Ball</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/1982_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1982 FIFA World Cup">1982</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Italy_national_football_team" title="Italy national football team"><img alt="Italy" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/15px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/23px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/30px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1500" data-file-height="1000" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Paolo_Rossi" title="Paolo Rossi">Rossi</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1986_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1986 FIFA World Cup">1986</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/15px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/23px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/30px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Diego_Maradona" title="Diego Maradona">Maradona</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1990_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1990 FIFA World Cup">1990</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Italy_national_football_team" title="Italy national football team"><img alt="Italy" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/15px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/23px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/30px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1500" data-file-height="1000" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Salvatore_Schillaci" title="Salvatore Schillaci">Schillaci</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1994_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1994 FIFA World Cup">1994</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Rom%C3%A1rio" title="Romário">Romário</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/1998_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1998 FIFA World Cup">1998</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Ronaldo_(Brazilian_footballer)" title="Ronaldo (Brazilian footballer)">Ronaldo</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/2002_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2002 FIFA World Cup">2002</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Germany_national_football_team" title="Germany national football team"><img alt="Germany" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/15px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/23px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/30px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Oliver_Kahn" title="Oliver Kahn">Kahn</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/2006_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2006 FIFA World Cup">2006</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/France_national_football_team" title="France national football team"><img alt="France" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/15px-Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/23px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/30px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Zinedine_Zidane" title="Zinedine Zidane">Zidane</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/2010_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2010 FIFA World Cup">2010</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Uruguay_national_football_team" title="Uruguay national football team"><img alt="Uruguay" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/15px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/23px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fe/Flag_of_Uruguay.svg/30px-Flag_of_Uruguay.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="945" data-file-height="630" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Diego_Forl%C3%A1n" title="Diego Forlán">Forlán</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/2014_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2014 FIFA World Cup">2014</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/15px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/23px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/30px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500" /></a></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/2018_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2018 FIFA World Cup">2018</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Croatia_national_football_team" title="Croatia national football team"><img alt="Croatia" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1b/Flag_of_Croatia.svg/15px-Flag_of_Croatia.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="8" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1b/Flag_of_Croatia.svg/23px-Flag_of_Croatia.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1b/Flag_of_Croatia.svg/30px-Flag_of_Croatia.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1200" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Luka_Modri%C4%87" title="Luka Modri">Modri</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><td class="navbox-abovebelow" colspan="2" style="background:gold;"><div><b>Golden Ball was first awarded in <a href="/wiki/1982_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1982 FIFA World Cup">1982</a>, and previous winners are uncertain.</b></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Ballon_d&amp;#039;Or" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Ballon_d%27Or_recipients" title="Template:Ballon d&#39;Or recipients"><abbr title="View this template" style="background: gold;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Ballon_d%27Or_recipients" title="Template talk:Ballon d&#39;Or recipients"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style="background: gold;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Ballon_d%27Or_recipients&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style="background: gold;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Ballon_d&amp;#039;Or" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Ballon_d%27Or" title="Ballon d&#39;Or">Ballon d'Or</a></div></th></tr><tr><td class="navbox-abovebelow" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><div id="*_France_Football_magazine_award">
<ul><li><i><a href="/wiki/France_Football" title="France Football">France Football</a></i> magazine award</li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%">Ballon d'Or (1956–2009)</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<li><a href="/wiki/1960_Ballon_d%27Or" title="1960 Ballon d&#39;Or">1960</a>: <a href="/wiki/Luis_Su%C3%A1rez_(footballer,_born_1935)" title="Luis Suárez (footballer, born 1935)">Suárez</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/1961_Ballon_d%27Or" title="1961 Ballon d&#39;Or">1961</a>: <a href="/wiki/Omar_S%C3%ADvori" title="Omar Sívori">Sívori</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/1962_Ballon_d%27Or" title="1962 Ballon d&#39;Or">1962</a>: <a href="/wiki/Josef_Masopust" title="Josef Masopust">Masopust</a></li>

<li><a href="/wiki/1965_Ballon_d%27Or" title="1965 Ballon d&#39;Or">1965</a>: <a href="/wiki/Eus%C3%A9bio" title="Eusébio">Eusébio</a></li>

<li><a href="/wiki/1970_Ballon_d%27Or" title="1970 Ballon d&#39;Or">1970</a>: <a href="/wiki/Gerd_M%C3%BCller" title="Gerd Müller">Müller</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/1971_Ballon_d%27Or" title="1971 Ballon d&#39;Or">1971</a>: <a href="/wiki/Johan_Cruyff" title="Johan Cruyff">Cruyff</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/1972_Ballon_d%27Or" title="1972 Ballon d&#39;Or">1972</a>: <a href="/wiki/Franz_Beckenbauer" title="Franz Beckenbauer">Beckenbauer</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/1973_Ballon_d%27Or" title="1973 Ballon d&#39;Or">1973</a>: <a href="/wiki/Johan_Cruyff" title="Johan Cruyff">Cruyff</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/1974_Ballon_d%27Or" title="1974 Ballon d&#39;Or">1974</a>: <a href="/wiki/Johan_Cruyff" title="Johan Cruyff">Cruyff</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/1975_Ballon_d%27Or" title="1975 Ballon d&#39;Or">1975</a>: <a href="/wiki/Oleg_Blokhin" title="Oleg Blokhin">Blokhin</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/1976_Ballon_d%27Or" title="1976 Ballon d&#39;Or">1976</a>: <a href="/wiki/Franz_Beckenbauer" title="Franz Beckenbauer">Beckenbauer</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/1977_Ballon_d%27Or" title="1977 Ballon d&#39;Or">1977</a>: <a href="/wiki/Allan_Simonsen" title="Allan Simonsen">Simonsen</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/1978_Ballon_d%27Or" title="1978 Ballon d&#39;Or">1978</a>: <a href="/wiki/Kevin_Keegan" title="Kevin Keegan">Keegan</a></li>

<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2004_FIFA_World_Player_of_the_Year" title="2004 FIFA World Player of the Year">2004</a>: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Ronaldinho" title="Ronaldinho">Ronaldinho</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2005_FIFA_World_Player_of_the_Year" title="2005 FIFA World Player of the Year">2005</a>: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Ronaldinho" title="Ronaldinho">Ronaldinho</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2006_FIFA_World_Player_of_the_Year" title="2006 FIFA World Player of the Year">2006</a>: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Italy_national_football_team" title="Italy national football team"><img alt="Italy" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/15px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/23px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/30px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1500" data-file-height="1000" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Fabio_Cannavaro" title="Fabio Cannavaro">Cannavaro</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2007_FIFA_World_Player_of_the_Year" title="2007 FIFA World Player of the Year">2007</a>: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span>  <a href="/wiki/Kak%C3%A1" title="Kaká">Kaká</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2008_FIFA_World_Player_of_the_Year" title="2008 FIFA World Player of the Year">2008</a>: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Portugal_national_football_team" title="Portugal national football team"><img alt="Portugal" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/15px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/23px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/5c/Flag_of_Portugal.svg/30px-Flag_of_Portugal.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="600" data-file-height="400" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">C. <li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/2009_FIFA_World_Player_of_the_Year" title="2009 FIFA World Player of the Year">2009</a>: <span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/15px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/23px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/30px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500" /></a></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li></ul>

</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="FourFourTwo_Player_of_the_year" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background:gold; color:Gold (color)"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:FourFourTwo_Player_of_the_year" title="Template:FourFourTwo Player of the year"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background:gold; color:Gold (color);background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:FourFourTwo_Player_of_the_year" title="Template talk:FourFourTwo Player of the year"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background:gold; color:Gold (color);background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:FourFourTwo_Player_of_the_year&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background:gold; color:Gold (color);background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="FourFourTwo_Player_of_the_year" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/FourFourTwo#Rankings_and_Awards" title="FourFourTwo">FourFourTwo Player of the year</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Goal_50_Best_Player" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background:gold; color:Gold (color)"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Goal_50_Best_Player" title="Template:Goal 50 Best Player"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background:gold; color:Gold (color);background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Goal_50_Best_Player" title="Template talk:Goal 50 Best Player"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background:gold; color:Gold (color);background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Goal_50_Best_Player&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background:gold; color:Gold (color);background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Goal_50_Best_Player" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Goal_(website)#Goal_50" title="Goal (website)">Goal 50 Best Player</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<li><span class="nowrap">1998: <a href="/wiki/Jasem_Al-Huwaidi" title="Jasem Al-Huwaidi">Al-Huwaidi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1999: <a href="/wiki/Ra%C3%BAl_(footballer)" title="Raúl (footballer)">Raúl</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2000: <a href="/wiki/Rivaldo" title="Rivaldo">Rivaldo</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2002: <a href="/wiki/Ruud_van_Nistelrooy" title="Ruud van Nistelrooy">van Nistelrooy</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2003: <a href="/wiki/Thierry_Henry" title="Thierry Henry">Henry</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2004: <a href="/wiki/Ali_Daei" title="Ali Daei">Daei</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2005: <a href="/wiki/Adriano_(footballer,_born_1982)" title="Adriano (footballer, born 1982)">Adriano</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2008: <a href="/wiki/Rico_(footballer)" title="Rico (footballer)">Rico</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <a href="/wiki/Shinji_Okazaki" title="Shinji Okazaki">Okazaki</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2010: <a href="/wiki/Bader_Al-Mutawa" title="Bader Al-Mutawa">Al-Mutawa</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2011: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2012: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2013: <a href="/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">C. Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2014: <a href="/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">C. Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2015: <a href="/wiki/Robert_Lewandowski" title="Robert Lewandowski">Lewandowski</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2016: <a href="/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">C. Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2017: <a href="/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">C. Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2018: <a href="/wiki/Baghdad_Bounedjah" title="Baghdad Bounedjah">Bounedjah</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2019: <a href="/wiki/Cristiano_Ronaldo" title="Cristiano Ronaldo">C. Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2020: <a href="/wiki/Romelu_Lukaku" title="Romelu Lukaku">Lukaku</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%">Best Defender</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<li>2010&#8211;16: <i>Not awarded</i></li>
<li>2016&#8211;17: <a href="/wiki/Sergio_Ramos" title="Sergio Ramos">Ramos</a></li>
<li>2017&#8211;18: <a href="/wiki/Sergio_Ramos" title="Sergio Ramos">Ramos</a></li>
<li>2018&#8211;19: <a href="/wiki/Virgil_van_Dijk" title="Virgil van Dijk">Van Dijk</a></li>
<li>2019&#8211;20: <a href="/wiki/Joshua_Kimmich" title="Joshua Kimmich">Kimmich</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;;width:1%">Best Midfielder</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li>1997&#8211;98: <a href="/wiki/Zinedine_Zidane" title="Zinedine Zidane">Zidane</a></li>

<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Footballer_of_the_Year_of_Argentina" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;background:gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Argentine_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="Template:Argentine Footballer of the Year"><abbr title="View this template" style="background: gold;background:gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Argentine_Footballer_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:Argentine Footballer of the Year"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style="background: gold;background:gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Argentine_Footballer_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style="background: gold;background:gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Footballer_of_the_Year_of_Argentina" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Footballer_of_the_Year_of_Argentina" title="Footballer of the Year of Argentina">Footballer of the Year of Argentina</a></div></th></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background: gold;width:1%">Original award</th><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">

<li><span class="nowrap">1980: <a href="/wiki/Diego_Maradona" title="Diego Maradona">Maradona</a> </span></li>

<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="La_Liga_Foreign_Player_of_the_Year_-_Don_Balón_Award" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2" style="background: gold;"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:La_Liga_Foreign_Player_of_the_Year" title="Template:La Liga Foreign Player of the Year"><abbr title="View this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:La_Liga_Foreign_Player_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:La Liga Foreign Player of the Year"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:La_Liga_Foreign_Player_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";background: gold;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="La_Liga_Foreign_Player_of_the_Year_-_Don_Balón_Award" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Don_Bal%C3%B3n_Award" title="Don Balón Award">La Liga Foreign Player of the Year - Don Balón Award</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1976: <a href="/wiki/Johan_Neeskens" title="Johan Neeskens">Neeskens</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1977: <a href="/wiki/Johan_Cruyff" title="Johan Cruyff">Cruyff</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1978: <a href="/wiki/Johan_Cruyff" title="Johan Cruyff">Cruyff</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1979: <a href="/wiki/Uli_Stielike" title="Uli Stielike">Stielike</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1980: <a href="/wiki/Uli_Stielike" title="Uli Stielike">Stielike</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1981: <a href="/wiki/Uli_Stielike" title="Uli Stielike">Stielike</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1982: <a href="/wiki/Uli_Stielike" title="Uli Stielike">Stielike</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1983: <a href="/wiki/Juan_Barbas" title="Juan Barbas">Barbas</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1984: <a href="/wiki/Juan_Barbas" title="Juan Barbas">Barbas</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1985: <a href="/wiki/Bernd_Schuster" title="Bernd Schuster">Schuster</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1986: <a href="/wiki/Jorge_Valdano" title="Jorge Valdano">Valdano</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1987: <a href="/wiki/Hugo_S%C3%A1nchez" title="Hugo Sánchez">Sánchez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1988: <a href="/wiki/Alem%C3%A3o_(footballer_born_1961)" class="mw-redirect" title="Alemão (footballer born 1961)">Alemão</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1989: <a href="/wiki/Oscar_Ruggeri" title="Oscar Ruggeri">Ruggeri</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1990: <a href="/wiki/Hugo_S%C3%A1nchez" title="Hugo Sánchez">Sánchez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1991: <a href="/wiki/Bernd_Schuster" title="Bernd Schuster">Schuster</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1992: <a href="/wiki/Michael_Laudrup" title="Michael Laudrup">Laudrup</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1993: <a href="/wiki/Miroslav_%C4%90uki%C4%87" title="Miroslav uki">uki</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1994: <a href="/wiki/Hristo_Stoichkov" title="Hristo Stoichkov">Stoichkov</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1995: <a href="/wiki/Iv%C3%A1n_Zamorano" title="Iván Zamorano">Zamorano</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1996: <a href="/wiki/Predrag_Mijatovi%C4%87" title="Predrag Mijatovi">Mijatovi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1997: <a href="/wiki/Ronaldo_(Brazilian_footballer)" title="Ronaldo (Brazilian footballer)">Ronaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1998: <a href="/wiki/Rivaldo" title="Rivaldo">Rivaldo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1999: <a href="/wiki/Lu%C3%ADs_Figo" title="Luís Figo">Figo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2000: <a href="/wiki/Lu%C3%ADs_Figo" title="Luís Figo">Figo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2001: <a href="/wiki/Lu%C3%ADs_Figo" title="Luís Figo">Figo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2002: <a href="/wiki/Zinedine_Zidane" title="Zinedine Zidane">Zidane</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2003: <a href="/wiki/Nihat_Kahveci" title="Nihat Kahveci">Nihat</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2004: <a href="/wiki/Ronaldinho" title="Ronaldinho">Ronaldinho</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2005: <a href="/wiki/Juan_Rom%C3%A1n_Riquelme" title="Juan Román Riquelme">Riquelme</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2006: <a href="/wiki/Ronaldinho" title="Ronaldinho">Ronaldinho</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2007: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2008: <a href="/wiki/Sergio_Ag%C3%BCero" title="Sergio Agüero">Agüero</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2010: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<li>1962–63: <a href="/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_Altafini" title="José Altafini">Altafini</a></li>

<li>2019–20: <a href="/wiki/Robert_Lewandowski" title="Robert Lewandowski">Lewandowski</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<li><span class="nowrap">2014: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2015: <a href="/wiki/Iago_Aspas" title="Iago Aspas">Aspas</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Neymar" title="Neymar">Neymar</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2016: <a href="/wiki/John_Guidetti" title="John Guidetti">Guidetti</a>, <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a>, <a href="/wiki/Munir_El_Haddadi" title="Munir El Haddadi">Munir</a>, <a href="/wiki/%C3%81lvaro_Negredo" title="Álvaro Negredo">Negredo</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Luis_Su%C3%A1rez" title="Luis Suárez">Suárez</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2017: <a href="/wiki/Wissam_Ben_Yedder" title="Wissam Ben Yedder">Ben Yedder</a> &amp; <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Messi</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2018: <a href="/wiki/V%C3%ADctor_Curto" title="Víctor Curto">Curto</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2019: <a href="/wiki/%C3%81ngel_Rodr%C3%ADguez_(Spanish_footballer)" title="Ángel Rodríguez (Spanish footballer)">Ángel</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Karl_Toko_Ekambi" title="Karl Toko Ekambi">Toko Ekambi</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<ul><li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/15px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/23px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/05/Flag_of_Brazil.svg/30px-Flag_of_Brazil.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="720" data-file-height="504" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Cafu" title="Cafu">Cafu</a></li>

<ul><li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/Soviet_Union_national_football_team" title="Soviet Union national football team"><img alt="Soviet Union" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a9/Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg/15px-Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="8" class="thumbborder" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a9/Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg/23px-Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/a/a9/Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg/30px-Flag_of_the_Soviet_Union.svg.png 2x" data-file-width="1200" data-file-height="600" /></a></span> <a href="/wiki/Lev_Yashin" title="Lev Yashin">Lev Yashin</a></li></ul>

<li><span class="nowrap">2013: <a href="/wiki/Isco" title="Isco">Isco</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2014: <a href="/wiki/Paul_Pogba" title="Paul Pogba">Pogba</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2015: <a href="/wiki/Domenico_Berardi" title="Domenico Berardi">Berardi</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div role="navigation" class="navbox" aria-labelledby="Laureus_World_Sports_Award_for_Sportsman_of_the_Year" style="width:&#123;&#123;&#123;width&#125;&#125;&#125;;;padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th scope="col" class="navbox-title" colspan="2"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r992953826"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Laureus_World_Sportsman_of_the_Year" title="Template:Laureus World Sportsman of the Year"><abbr title="View this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Laureus_World_Sportsman_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:Laureus World Sportsman of the Year"><abbr title="Discuss this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Laureus_World_Sportsman_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit"><abbr title="Edit this template" style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Laureus_World_Sports_Award_for_Sportsman_of_the_Year" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Laureus_World_Sports_Award_for_Sportsman_of_the_Year" title="Laureus World Sports Award for Sportsman of the Year">Laureus World Sports Award for Sportsman of the Year</a></div></th></tr><tr><td colspan="2" class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0px"><div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">2000–01: <a href="/wiki/Tiger_Woods" title="Tiger Woods">Tiger Woods</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2002: <a href="/wiki/Michael_Schumacher" title="Michael Schumacher">Michael Schumacher</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2003: <a href="/wiki/Lance_Armstrong" title="Lance Armstrong">Lance Armstrong</a>*</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2004: <a href="/wiki/Michael_Schumacher" title="Michael Schumacher">Michael Schumacher</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2005–08: <a href="/wiki/Roger_Federer" title="Roger Federer">Roger Federer</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2009–10: <a href="/wiki/Usain_Bolt" title="Usain Bolt">Usain Bolt</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2011: <a href="/wiki/Rafael_Nadal" title="Rafael Nadal">Rafael Nadal</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2012: <a href="/wiki/Novak_Djokovic" title="Novak Djokovic">Novak Djokovic</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2013: <a href="/wiki/Usain_Bolt" title="Usain Bolt">Usain Bolt</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2014: <a href="/wiki/Sebastian_Vettel" title="Sebastian Vettel">Sebastian Vettel</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2015–16: <a href="/wiki/Novak_Djokovic" title="Novak Djokovic">Novak Djokovic</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2017: <a href="/wiki/Usain_Bolt" title="Usain Bolt">Usain Bolt</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2018: <a href="/wiki/Roger_Federer" title="Roger Federer">Roger Federer</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2019: <a href="/wiki/Novak_Djokovic" title="Novak Djokovic">Novak Djokovic</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2020: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Lionel Messi</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Lewis_Hamilton" title="Lewis Hamilton">Lewis Hamilton</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
